tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_location VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    responsible_engineer VARCHAR(255),
    environmental_impact TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    project_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_start_date DATE,
    project_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    impact_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_rating INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_project_id FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    assessment_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE project_stakeholders (
    stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50)
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessment(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_reports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    assessment_date DATE,
    impact_score INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_manager VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ConstructionProjects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalAssessments (
  assessment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT REFERENCES ConstructionProjects(project_id),
  assessment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  impact_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  risk_level INT NOT NULL
);
